body_html: I think for now it is fine to update the documentation of auxiliary_name_scope making the intentions clear, like @facaiy suggested. As a side note, I find all the scoping very troublesome. It is too complex and has so many side-effects. But that's just my 5cents.
body_text: I think for now it is fine to update the documentation of auxiliary_name_scope making the intentions clear, like @facaiy suggested. As a side note, I find all the scoping very troublesome. It is too complex and has so many side-effects. But that's just my 5cents.
body: I think for now it is fine to update the documentation of `auxiliary_name_scope` making the intentions clear, like @facaiy suggested. As a side note, I find all the scoping very troublesome. It is too complex and has so many side-effects. But that's just my 5cents.
